explanation: To complete the task of putting wet soap in the garbage can or washing the soap bar and putting it in the trash bin, we will need the SoapBar and DishSponge from the available objects. The TrashCan and TrashBin will be used to dispose of the soap. Other objects like Cloth, Candle, ToiletPaper, HandTowel, Plunger, SprayBottle, Towel, and ScrubBrush are not needed for this specific task.
